channel.title: Updates on Lenz Zuber
channel.description: Recent content in Updates on Lenz Zuber

item.title: Hi there!
item.description: I have no idea how you have found your way to this mostly empty, but beautiful, place! Recently, I discovered this beautiful Logseq-Plugin logseq-schrodinger which converts my Knowledge Graph into a beautiful Hugo Website using this beautiful template. I haven’t decided yet, which pages I would like to publish and which not. Lets see how it goes! To start, checkout Zettelkasten Method.

item.title: Hi there!
